entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is a person who is talking to Harry and trying to intimidate him. He mentions that he knows the rules of Hogwarts and that Harry would get expelled if he used his wand.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is being talked to by Dudley. He is hiding something, which Dudley suspects is a wand.

relationships.description: Dudley accuses Harry of having a wand and trying to intimidate him with it. He mentions that Harry would get expelled if he used his wand.
Dudley challenges Harry to a fight, implying that he is not afraid of him. He mentions that Harry needs four mates behind him to beat someone up.
